title: Binding Price Ceiling and Inferior Goods

content.question: Assume that the government imposes a binding price ceiling on a market for an inferior good. Which of the following is most likely to occur in the market if consumersâ€™ incomes increase?

choices.label: The market demand will shift to the right.
The market supply will shift to the right.
The shortage in the market will decrease.
The surplus in the market will increase.

content.answer: The shortage in the market will decrease.
